feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In a discussion between Alan Reiner and Mike Hearn on March 13, 2014, it was decided to include uBTC (microbitcoin) in the next Armory release. However, Wladimir questioned whether this would be the default for new installs or if current users would also be switched over automatically. No further information was provided in the context.
